title: Rebirth of an Anchor - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Gender Bender   Romance   Shounen Ai
tags: Doting Love Interests   Identity Crisis   Multiple Identities   Second Chance
author: Yao Ri Yue   邀日月
description:
Xie Anran, who has multiple personality disorder, has three souls living inside his body.

One is a timid nerd, one is a cold pretty boy, and one is a flirty ladyboy.

Before he was reborn, Xie Anran was secretly in love with Sui Yuan, but did not manage to restrain the flirty ladyboy in his body who went to make a confession.

Sui Yuan’s face was full of rejection: “Go away.”

This time, the Xie Anrans collectively became “corrupted” and were determined to do anything in their power to capture Sui Yuan (no matter how dirty the means) and announce to the world — this male god is ours now!

Thus, Sui Yuan’s live streaming platform had three new anchors.

One is an unrivaled mid-laner ace, who talks with strength.

One is a prince of love songs, once his voice is sounded out, the melody lingers and reverberates in the air for an extended period of time.

One is a rare beauty who can adapt to many roles, such as pure, gorgeous, virtuous, or humble.

Afterwards Sui Yuan discovered that they were all actually the same person.

And so, this is a “I and I and I like you very much, let us four be together ~\(≧▽≦)/~” story.>
